metadata.title: CVE-2024-25580 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gui/util/qktxhandler.cpp in Qt before 5.15.17,6.x before 6.2.12, 6.3.x through 6.5.x before 6.5.5, and 6.6.x before6.6.2. A buffer overflow and application crash can occur via a crafted KTXimage file.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtbase-opensource-src-gles: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
